gampaha yakkala nagaraye pihiti bemmulle padinchi chandana shrinath wikramarathnata saha mirigama padinchi kristropar jerami hart yana dedenata himiwa thibu ema sayikal aayathanaya wasa dama sathwa gowi polak arambaimata mudal laba ganima sandaha ema aayathanaye alewiya sandaha thibu papadi thogaya wikinimata puwath pathaka danwimak pala kara atha.ee anuwa pa padi thogaya miladi ganima sandaha ooshan lidars wishan agro diwolapmant samagamen yayi kiya ganna pirisak me aayathanaya wetha pamina atha.itha watina nawina pannaye aluth kab rathayakin pamina athi me pirisehi siti bhanda parikshaka miladi ganim saha thakserukara niladhari yanuwen peni siti ee. ee. es. silwa namathi pudgalaya pa padi thogaya pariksha kara bala atha.me sanwidhanathmaka horu kalliya anuradhapuraya polonnaruwa wani aatha pradeshawalada puwathpath danwim anuwa wancha sidu kirima kalantharayak sidu kara athi bawa polis aaranchi marga pawasayi.me kandayama sewima sandaha polis parikshana, gampaha jyeshta polis adhikari ech. ee. ee. sarath kumara mahathage upades matha gampaha wishesha aparadha anshaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka wayi. am. wijerathna mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe polis sarayan 57431 mahinda athulu niladhari kandayamak wisin sidu karanu labe.
